name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Petitioner v. Anthony ARMSTRONG, Respondent

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Petitioner v. Anthony ARMSTRONG, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 8th day of January, 2014, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED. The issue, as stated by Petitioner, is:
Does 42 Pa.C.S.A. Section 9714(a)(2) require prior sentencing as a second strike offender to invoke the third-strike sentencing provision?
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
83 A.3d 411
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Petitioner v. Anthony ARMSTRONG, Respondent.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Jan. 8, 2014.
